column5: Due to the lack of pike chat I started my own pike message board   have a look around send me some feed back thx guys Cook's Bay Pike Anglers message board
I don't know if it's a good/fair idea to advertise another fishing site on this fishing site  but that would be up to the mods, I guess
Thanks Terry Your so right, Delete away Men I understand..
Well I guess the powers that be have spoken, thanks guys
They probably just took Sunday off.....
They have more then sundays off lol

it doesn't look like any mods, commented or removed anything, so I don't know what they  think about this  I just thought if I was in homedepot I wouldn't put up an ad for rona without asking  but thread is here so people now know about your website, so life is good
sharing info is what it's all about
I joined the board..........love Pike fishing.

There's nothing wrong with members starting their own boards at all. Fishing for members on someone elses' board is a little delicate but hey, knock yourself out.  It is kinda weird that members who are joining that board have very seldom posted a pike thread on our board. One in particular has been here since 2006 and has post a total of ONE pike thread.  Anyhow, best of luck to you.
